tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Cough In Children,Allergic Reaction,stomach and intestinal infections,Fever,
review: I have been consulting sir for my daughter and I want to convey it to all the parents in banaglore or our of banaglore, any infection or medical assistance that your child needs if it's not getting cured or for any second third opinion please Please consult Sir.. He is a great doctor and staff at chirayu is of so good nature and very kind and helpful. All the staff is just best of their generosity. I have been to Sir for all Infections and every time it is so relaxing after consulting him with minimum medicines.  Any of my family member who have visited us at Bangalore and some issue with kids, we have taken them to him. And their trust on Sir is so much that even now after going back to their states they do video consultation with sir when they need any second opinion.  Sir has immense patience and a super great Doctor.  The saying that Doctors are next to God is very vry apt for him.Thank you Sir for helping us each time. my daughter is so fond of him, she says I want to be doctor like doctor uncle.

tags: None
review: Lucky to have finally found the doctor who really is working for the patients. The doctor patiently listens to the problem and diagnoses the baby. Also while suggesting medicine he always asks to avoid if not really required. Process in the Chirayu clinic is very streamlined and fast. Vaccination process take a matter of minutes as they are kept in-house. Doctor himself administers the vaccines.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Balachandra **** ****** **** ************* *** well informed about the disease and various aspects of diagnosis and treatment. He didn't suggest unnecessary tests and medications. The overall professionalism of the staff was appreciable and waiting time was quite less.

tags: None
review: I am not satisfied with the treatment at all..it was simply a waste of time for me. I went for drug allergy test which he already mentioned as oral drug challenge procedure. I already informed the dictor that I am allergic to certain kind of dusts...he did skin test and concluded that I am allergic to dustmites which ll cause allergy for certain dusts..OMG!! that was already known to me. And when I asked him about the drug test he told like the procedure which we did is no way related to tht.. finaly I got a good bill amount for my 3-4 hours of my time which got simply wasted.

tags: None
review: The doctor never spends time with the patients. He never ellaborates about the health condition and He is always in a hurry. ** ******* **** ** **** ******** ** *** ******* When he gave vaccine to my child, the blood oozed out and still there is swelling and it is really hard. My child cannot move her thighs and it has been a week since we gave the vaccination. The doctor may be experienced. But, what is the point if he doesn't communicate with the parents?

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** *********** ** *** **** ************* * **** **** **** ** *** **** ********* *** ************* ** *** ******* *** ********* He does a thorough check up of the child, gives patient hearing to his symptoms and diagnose. He never scare his patients but explain in details about the situation, prevention and cure. Children with common cold, cough and respiratory problem should trust him.

tags: None
review: Not satisfied..inspite of mentioning my conditions which seemed allergy and tests showed 10 times elevated levels, doctor just asked me to take medicine given by physician earlier. It's been 20 days and medicine course over , conditions have not really improved.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: Baby had been to india (From US) for first time and doctor suggested all the options to keep her safe and secure.

tags: None
review: One of the poor place to go for treatment. He will not even spend 1minute of his time. Before you finish they will send the next patient and you cannot complete your questions. I will not recommend this at all.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,

review: I used to consult Dr Balchandra for my daughters. We are highly satisfied with the treatment and advice. My daughter has allergy issues and his advice and medicines have always worked. He doesn't prescribe antibiotics unnecessarily. We are moving to Netherlands now and will surely miss doctors like him. Thank you sir, All the best

tags: None
review: Have been visting Dr Balachandra for nearly two nears for my son who is 6 years now . He is very gentle and patient in answering all the doubts and his medication is very gentle and effective on the child . He doesn't hurry into prescribing heavy drugs for anyone . And this practice really works . From the day I started visiting Dr balachandra till date I have not used antibiotics for my son . And this way has really built my sons resistance , what else can I ask for as a parent

review: We have been consulting Dr. Balachandra since the birth of my son in 2015. Doctor is amazing with his knowledge on child's health. He understands each case separately with patience and ensures the prescriptions and easily understandable. *** *** ********* ** ********** *** ****** **** *********** *** ** ****** He is a great doctor and a very good human being. I would definitely recommend anyone who are looking for great pediatrician, to go with Dr. Balachandra.

review:
- If you take apointment also you need to wait in queue. 
- Doctor will give some medicine and ask to buy from their pharmacy on the same floor. And after buying only they will explain dose.
